text: Consider a database that has the relation schema EMP (Empld, EmpName, and DeptName). An instance of the schema EMP and a SQL query on it are given below: EMP T X | A I S S Gl I GO | X | A | o | [ Ao | SELECT AVG(EC.Num) FROM EC WHERE (DeptName, Num) IN (SELECT DeptName, COUNT(EmpId) AS EC(DeptName, Num) FROM EMP GROUP BY DeptName) The output of executing the SQL query is .
